**Tender Description:**

The Correctional Service Canada, Pacific Region, is seeking a contractor to provide fire alarm and life safety testing and inspections at William Head Institution. The contractor must provide comprehensive maintenance services, including scheduled maintenance, semi-annual and annual testing and inspections, and three and five-year testing.

The work must be performed in accordance with fire protection system standards CAN/ULC S536 and CAN/ULC S552, NFCC 2020, CSA B64.10.1-11, and NFPA 10 and 25.

**Deliverables:** The contractor must provide all necessary tools, equipment, parts, materials, and labor to perform the mandatory maintenance requirements and tests.

**Estimated Quantity of Commodity:** See the solicitation document for details.

**Duration of Contract and Time Frame for Delivery:** The contract period is 13 May
